Baltimore.Maryland Institute College of Art:
Maryland Institute College of Art (MICA) is an art and design college in Baltimore, Maryland. It was founded in 1826 as the "Maryland Institute for the Promotion of the Mechanic Arts", making it one of the oldest art colleges in the United States.
In 2014, MICA was ranked seventh in the nation among fine arts programs by U.S. News and World Report, and its Graphic Design Master of Fine Arts program was ranked third among graduate schools for Graphic Design in 2012.
